title: SOLUTION TO LOG ON CLIENT!
body:
Hey guys, this is for the people that have Avast. Avast thinks that LoL is a virus and league won't open. follow these steps:
1) Open Avast
2)Right click on any of the options you want to get rid of, (smart scan, browser clean up, home network security etc) and select virus chest
3) Click Virus chest
4) find the LoL launcher.exe
5) Right click on it and select "restore and add to exclusions"
6) Close it and your client should be working! 

Hope this helps with the people that have Avast!

replies.body: mine still isnt working :( im thinking of reinstalling
#[How some League players gain a huge advantage over others](http://redirectwp.com/yt/)

If you are considering reinstalling, delete everything of RADS first, then go to control pannel and un-install league then re-download it. Make sure to delete everything releated to league off your C: drive before uninstalling :) hope that helps
but i dont have it installed on my c drive
Where ever you downloaded it. Delete it all, everything in the league of legends folder. then un-install
No worries guys! If anyone needs help that has Avast. Tell them to come to this thread.

Hey Xeno,

Thanks for explaining how to add League as an exception. I'm not familiar with Avast so wouldn't have known what to tell people :3
